title: GPT-5 and the new era of work
raw_excerpt: GPT-5 is OpenAI’s most advanced model—transforming enterprise AI, automation, and workforce productivity in the new era of intelligent work.
raw_body: GPT-5 is OpenAI’s most advanced model—transforming enterprise AI, automation, and workforce productivity in the new era of intelligent work.
speedrun: GPT-5 is OpenAI's latest model enhancing enterprise AI and workforce productivity.
why_it_matters: Enhances productivity for businesses and employees.

lenses.eli12: GPT-5 is a powerful AI tool. It helps businesses work better and faster.
lenses.pm: Users include businesses seeking efficiency. The market is competitive, with risks in adoption and integration.
lenses.engineer: GPT-5 uses advanced algorithms and large datasets. Constraints include data privacy and computational limits.
